data.title: Dr. Mike Sullivan â€“ Clarity Christian College
data.text:
Mike was Registrar, Director of Admissions, and Bible teacher at Florida Bible College for many years. He has served with New Tribes Missions for over 33 years, and for 28 years in administration and teaching at New Tribes Bible Institute Ministries, where Mike continues to teach as adjunct professor and itinerate conference speaker and teacher.

He currently serves with Ethnos 360 as Executive Board Director of Church Relations, Academic Coordinator for the Bible Institutes in Waukesha, WI & Jackson, MI, Oversight of the Enrichment program and HQ Chapel programs, Oversight of Doctrinal Issues facing the mission and within the mission, and is Missions and Bible Conference Speaker at large.

He has been on an incredible 47 year journey that has taken him around the world physically Thailand, Europe, Papua New Guinea, and Brazil, and by extension through the thousands of lives taught in his 35 years at the Bible Institutes. He also serves on the Curriculum Team of Florida Bible College developing the Missions Concentration of Florida Bible College.
